title.rendered: Atlasjet Ukraine Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
LLC “Airline “Atlasjet Ukraine” was registered on September 30, 2013. One of the main shareholders of the airline is Atlasjet Havacilik A.S. (Turkey). The fleet of the airline consists the modern aircrafts of Airbus A320 models. The airline received a license for providing the services on transportation of passengers, cargo by air transport from State Aviation Administration of Ukraine in April 2014, and in April 2015 received the certificate to perform commercial air transportation. Its first flight on the route Kiev-Lvov the airline completed on June 18, 2015. Since August 2015 Atlasjet Ukraine has been using the Atlasglobal trade mark.

 

Atlasjet Ukraine Address: HEAD OFFICE in KIEV

103 Stolychne Highway

Business-center “Europe”, 5th floor

Кiev 03131, Ukraine,

Phone Number : +38 (044) 277-41-41

Email : info-ua@atlasjet.com

Opening hours : Monday – Thursday 09:00 – 18:00, Friday 09:00 – 17:30 (local time)

Atlasjet Ukraine Address: Odessa Representative Ticket Office

Representative Ticket Office

Globus Airticket Agency

Odessa International Airport, first floor

Phone Number : +38 068 472 92 33

Opening hours :Opening Hours : Daily 08:00 – 20:00

Atlasjet Ukraine Phone: 0 800 505 563

Email: General Concerns and Proposals : info-ua@atlasglb.com

Ticket Booking and Sales : sales-ua@atlasglb.comCustomer Relations : customer-ua@atlasglb.comLost & Found Baggage Service : lf-ua@atlasglb.comGroup Booking Request : group-ua@atlasglb.com

Atlasjet Ukraine Official website: http://www.alexandriaairlines.com/alexandriaairline.aspx

Atlasjet Ukraine Baggage Allowance

Atlasjet Ukraine Baggage Allowance

View Atlasjet Ukraine Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Atlasjet Ukraine Special Assistance Services:

Travelling while pregnant in Atlasjet Ukraine

Pregnancy rules in Atlasjet Ukraine :

Pregnant mother can travel up to the 28th ( 7 months ) of pregnancy are not prompted any report. The pregnant passenger is required to declare how many babies she is expecting and the stage of pregnancy. Pregnant passengers with single baby after the end of 28th week, (7 months completed) until the end of 35th week (is not beyond day 36th week) need to present a report from their doctors that contains the phrase “There is no doubt for this patient to travel by aircraft“ stating that passenger is fit to fly. After completion of 35th week, passenger can not be allowed to fly even with a doctor’s report. Expectant mother with multiples (two or more babies), from the end of 28th week, until the end of 32th week (is not beyond day 33th week) need to present a report from their doctors that contains the phrase “there is no doubt for this patient to travel by aircraft“ stating that passenger is fit to fly. After completion of 32th week, passenger can not be allowed to fly even with a doctor’s report.

For more details visit : http://www.atlasglb.com.ua/frequently-asked-questions#Pregnant_passengers

Travelling with pet in Atlasjet Ukraine : 

For more details visit : http://www.atlasglb.com.ua/frequently-asked-questions#Carrying_Pets_In_The_Cabin_Contents

 Queries handled Atlasjet Ukraine Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Atlasmiles

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Atlasjet Ukraine Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Atlasjet Ukraine : (click on the stars below)
